Text: hi, this is my first torrent and im a bit confused, for some reason the torrent was saying there was an error, i figured that out (it was to do with the ports) but after i fixed that it still wouldnt work, so i clicked forced re-check of the files and now its saying i only have 98.8% of them. can anyone tell me how to fix this so that i can seed the file properly? thanks Libran.
